pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Decreasingly Informative Priors for Early Termination Phase II Trials // Provide early termination phase II trial designs with a decreasingly informative prior (DIP) or a regular Bayesian prior chosen by the user. The program can determine the minimum planned sample size necessary to achieve the user-specified admissible designs. The program can also perform power and expected sample size calculations for the tests in early termination Phase II trials. See Wang C and Sabo RT (2022) doi:10.18203/2349-3259.ijct20221110; Sabo RT (2014) doi:10.1080/10543406.2014.888441.
